website_summaries.verdict: Griddle heats up quickly for breakfast perfection.
pros: Ceramic nonstick surface cuts down on cooking time
Allows you to adjust temperature from 200 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit
Customers report the griddle is sturdy and comfortable to cook with
cons: We wish the frame were a bit stronger

customer_reviews.title: Great Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 different griddles since adulthood. This one is big enough to fit an entire package of bacon. It offers a flatter design than some I've owned which both solve a problem and create one simultaneously. You are able to cook eggs without them going down the drainage hole, but also you have to occasionally pour off bacon grease if it doesn't completely drain. The surface is non-stick copper and allows for a smooth cooking process. My one and only suggestion is to cook food at a lower temperature, as the sweet spot is about 275 for this model compared to 300-350 for others.
customer_reviews.author: Micha
